entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Gold bars while editing code using compound assignment #71980
  • Roslyn LSP server is packaging more than it should #71978
  • Support more format string embedded langauges #71973
    Backlog
  • Compiler freeze with custom assembly attribute #71970

Closed

  • CS8846 | Analyzer says the switch expression does not handle all cases, but I say otherwise #71971

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP #71983
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Beef up type inferrer #71982
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix some comments in the Workspaces.MSBuild project file #71981
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only request the necessary document and project in GraphBuilder.PopulateMapsForFileInputNode #71977
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • CompilationOutputInfo.AssemblyPath should be a normalized path #71975
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respond to VS LSP diagnostic breaking changes #71967
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify compilation tracking (part4) #71972
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bootstrap Framework should be CI only #71979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extract type to its own file. #71974
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking (part3) #71966
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking (part 2) #71964
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #71934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Enable implicit primary constructor parameter capture analyzer #71905
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking #71963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make constructor with additional argument private #71965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Correct show behavior in IntelliSense page. #71857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
